author_name.description: Author name for Git commits. Defaults to `Flux`.

branch.description: Branch of the repository to reconcile from. Defaults to `main`.

commit_message_appendix.description: String to add to the commit messages.

gpg_key_id.description: Key id for selecting a particular GPG key.

gpg_key_ring.description: Path to the GPG key ring for signing commits.

gpg_passphrase.description: Passphrase for decrypting GPG private key.

certificate_authority.description: Certificate authority to validate self-signed certificates.

hostkey_algos.description: The list of hostkey algorithms to use for ssh connections, arranged from most preferred to the least.

password.description: Password of the SSH private key.

private_key.description: Private key used for authenticating to the Git SSH server.

url.description: Url of Git repository to bootstrap from.

git.description: Configuration block with settings for Git.

client_certificate.description: PEM-encoded client certificate for TLS authentication.

client_key.description: PEM-encoded client certificate key for TLS authentication.

cluster_ca_certificate.description: PEM-encoded root certificates bundle for TLS authentication.

config_context.description: Context to choose from the config file.

config_context_auth_info.description: Authentication info context of the kube config (name of the kubeconfig user, `--user` flag in `kubectl`).

config_context_cluster.description: Cluster context of the kube config (name of the kubeconfig cluster, `--cluster` flag in `kubectl`).

config_path.description: Path to the kube config file. Can be set with KUBE_CONFIG_PATH.

config_paths.description: A list of paths to kube config files. Can be set with KUBE_CONFIG_PATHS environment variable.

exec.description: Kubernetes client authentication exec plugin configuration.

host.description: The hostname (in form of URI) of Kubernetes master.

insecure.description: Whether server should be accessed without verifying the TLS certificate.

password.description: The password to use for HTTP basic authentication when accessing the Kubernetes master endpoint.

proxy_url.description: URL to the proxy to be used for all API requests.

token.description: Token to authenticate an service account.

username.description: The username to use for HTTP basic authentication when accessing the Kubernetes master endpoint.

kubernetes.description: Configuration block with settings for Kubernetes.

cluster_domain.description: The internal cluster domain. Defaults to `cluster.local`

components.description: Toolkit components to include in the install manifests. Defaults to `[source-controller kustomize-controller helm-controller notification-controller]`

components_extra.description: List of extra components to include in the install manifests.

delete_git_manifests.description: Delete manifests from git repository. Defaults to `true`.

disable_secret_creation.description: Use the existing secret for flux controller and don't create one from bootstrap

embedded_manifests.description: When enabled, the Flux manifests will be extracted from the provider binary instead of being downloaded from GitHub.com. Defaults to `false`.

image_pull_secret.description: Kubernetes secret name used for pulling the toolkit images from a private registry.

interval.description: Interval at which to reconcile from bootstrap repository. Defaults to `1m0s`.

keep_namespace.description: Keep the namespace after uninstalling Flux components. Defaults to `false`.

kustomization_override.description: Kustomization to override configuration set by default.

log_level.description: Log level for toolkit components. Defaults to `info`.

manifests_path.description: The install manifests are built from a GitHub release or kustomize overlay if using a local path. Defaults to `https://github.com/fluxcd/flux2/releases`.

namespace.description: The namespace scope for install manifests. Defaults to `flux-system`. It will be created if it does not exist.

network_policy.description: Deny ingress access to the toolkit controllers from other namespaces using network policies. Defaults to `true`.

path.description: Path relative to the repository root, when specified the cluster sync will be scoped to this path (immutable).

recurse_submodules.description: Configures the GitRepository source to initialize and include Git submodules in the artifact it produces.

registry.description: Container registry where the toolkit images are published. Defaults to `ghcr.io/fluxcd`.

registry_credentials.description: Container registry credentials in the format 'user:password'

repository_files.description: Git repository files created and managed by the provider.

secret_name.description: Name of the secret the sync credentials can be found in or stored to. Defaults to `flux-system`.

create.description: A string that can be [parsed as a duration](https://pkg.go.dev/time#ParseDuration) consisting of numbers and unit suffixes, such as "30s" or "2h45m". Valid time units are "s" (seconds), "m" (minutes), "h" (hours).

delete.description: A string that can be [parsed as a duration](https://pkg.go.dev/time#ParseDuration) consisting of numbers and unit suffixes, such as "30s" or "2h45m". Valid time units are "s" (seconds), "m" (minutes), "h" (hours). Setting a timeout for a Delete operation is only applicable if changes are saved into state before the destroy operation occurs.

read.description: A string that can be [parsed as a duration](https://pkg.go.dev/time#ParseDuration) consisting of numbers and unit suffixes, such as "30s" or "2h45m". Valid time units are "s" (seconds), "m" (minutes), "h" (hours). Read operations occur during any refresh or planning operation when refresh is enabled.

update.description: A string that can be [parsed as a duration](https://pkg.go.dev/time#ParseDuration) consisting of numbers and unit suffixes, such as "30s" or "2h45m". Valid time units are "s" (seconds), "m" (minutes), "h" (hours).

toleration_keys.description: List of toleration keys used to schedule the components pods onto nodes with matching taints.

version.description: Flux version. Defaults to `v2.6.4`. Has no effect when `embedded_manifests` is enabled.

watch_all_namespaces.description: If true watch for custom resources in all namespaces. Defaults to `true`.

block.description: Commits Flux components to a Git repository and configures a Kubernetes cluster to synchronize with the same Git repository.
